portfolio.title: Car trading platform mobile app
portfolio.description: Native mobile apps (iOS and Android) built with Vue.js and Capacitor.

portfolio.title: Car trading platform website
portfolio.description: A web app built with Vue.js, Node.js, Express.js, Tailwind CSS, Firebase and PostgreSQL.

portfolio.title: Video to mp3 converter
portfolio.description: A microservice that converts video to mp3 built using Python, RabbitMQ, MongoDB, mySQL, Docker and Kubernetes.

testimonial.description: Tom is detail-oriented, well-organized, highly efficient and able to work under pressure. He is also a promising and hardworking team player who can always use his best endeavours to perform all job assignments proficiently and conscientiously. Throughout the time I have known Tom, he has proven himself to be a nice, thoughtful, and enthusiastic subordinate who showed tremendous dedication to the team. He was always willing to offer his assistance and support to his colleagues.

Tom is a problem solver and a quick learner. He is well-organized when approaching problems and is passionate and proactive in figuring out solutions. Tom thinks through a problem from both product and technical perspectives. With his can-do attitude, work ethic and dedication to work, he is capable of managing projects proficiently, delivering high-quality products, and maintaining good relationships with clients and the internal team. Tom was definitely a pleasure to work with.
